### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE FacultyInfo (
  faculty_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  qualifications VARCHAR,
  teaching_assignments VARCHAR,
  research_activities VARCHAR
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE FacultyInfo SET qualifications='PhD' WHERE faculty_id=101;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE faculty_qualifications (
  faculty_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  degree VARCHAR(50),
  institution VARCHAR(50),
  year_completed INT
);


CREATE TABLE faculty_assignments (
  faculty_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  course_code VARCHAR(10),
  course_title VARCHAR(50),
  department VARCHAR(50),
  teaching_hours INT
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE faculty_qualifications
SET degree = 'PhD'
WHERE faculty_id = 101;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE qualifications (
    qualification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    faculty_id INT,
    degree VARCHAR(100),
    institution VARCHAR(100),
    year_completed INT
);


CREATE TABLE teaching_assignments (
    assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    faculty_id INT,
    course_id INT,
    semester VARCHAR(50),
    year INT
);


CREATE TABLE research_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    faculty_id INT,
    title VARCHAR(200),
    description TEXT,
    date DATE
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE qualifications SET degree='Bachelor of Science' WHERE qualification_id=1;
